title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.3 - Date of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.3 - Date of hearing

State Regulations

The chair shall prepare a calendar of cases for arbitration
and shall arrange a time and place of hearing. At least 30 days prior to the
date set for hearing, notice thereof shall be mailed to the podiatrist and
carrier, advising the date, time and place of hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
342.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
